mapper.sql: id, integral, target, typeId, otherTypeId, integralType, memberid, createTime, deptid, clearid,staffid
mapper.select:
SELECT b.productname, b.productnum, b.producttype, sum(a.consumptionNum) AS count,
( select sum(consumptionNum) FROM main_inventory_management WHERE 1=1 and status= 1 and deptid =#{deptId} and integralrecordtypeid = b.id and (createTime between CONCAT(#{monthTime1},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{monthTime2},' 23:59:59')) ) month,
( select sum(consumptionNum) FROM main_inventory_management WHERE 1=1 and status= 1 and deptid =#{deptId} and integralrecordtypeid = b.id and (createTime between CONCAT(#{periodTime1},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{periodTime2},' 23:59:59')) ) time_to_end,
b.deptid FROM main_inventory_management a INNER JOIN main_integralrecordtype b ON b.id = a.integralrecordtypeid WHERE a.deptid =#{deptId} and a.status=1 GROUP BY a.integralrecordtypeid
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${desc}
ORDER BY count DESC
limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from ( SELECT count(*) FROM main_inventory_management a INNER JOIN main_integralrecordtype b ON b.id = a.integralrecordtypeid WHERE a.deptid =#{deptId} and a.status=1 GROUP BY a.integralrecordtypeid limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize} ) as a
